versionNotes:
- Merged latest lineage kernel source 
- Re-enable ThunderPlug hotplug 
- Huge update to kernel.org mainline 3.10.62 
- Add IOSCHED_SWITCHER by @sultanxda This enables a driver that switches the I/O scheduler for a single block device to Noop when the screen turns off, and back to its original I/O scheduler after a delay when the screen is turned back on
